toast.codeclient.update.title: CodeClient was updated to %s
toast.codeclient.update_available.title: CodeClient Update: %s
codeclient.toast.unofficial_address: The server address you used to connect to DiamondFire is unofficially hosted by a third party. For security reasons, we have replaced it with the official address.
codeclient.config.tab.general.tooltip: General always specific options for CodeClient.
codeclient.config.auto_update.descriptio: Whether CodeClient should check for updates, and whether it should update or notify.
codeclient.config.api.description: Allows external apps to add code to your plot.
codeclient.config.read_charset.descripti: Can fix artifacts in ActionDump loading.
codeclient.config.save_charset.descripti: When getting the actiondump get it in a needed format.
codeclient.config.dev_for_build.descript: Uses dev mode instead of build mode, clearing your inventory and teleporting you.
codeclient.config.auto_focus_search.desc: When opening the Code Palette (%s) automatically select the search bar.
This is disabled because it interferes with navigation binds.
codeclient.config.chat_edits_vars.descri: Opening chat whilst holding a value will automatically put the contents in chat.
codeclient.config.ccdbug.description: Toggle CCDBUG, which is a variable and entity watcher for debugging.
codeclient.config.givestrings.descriptio: If CodeClient should automatically give you result of /uuid and /name commands when in dev mode.
codeclient.config.autojoin.description: If and where to auto join.
codeclient.config.autojoin.enabled.descr: If CodeClient should automatically connect you to DF.
codeclient.config.autojoin.plot.descript: If you want a plot on beta, make sure you set the node.
codeclient.config.tab.navigation.descrip: How you move about in the codespace and the likes.
codeclient.config.noclip.description: Whether you can walk through codeblocks, additionally enables codespace travel by looking up/down and jumping/sneaking.
codeclient.config.airstrafe_modifier.des: How much faster you go when jumping in dev space.
Your jump speed will be based of walking speed.
codeclient.config.angle_up.description: When facing up, within this angle, jumping will take you up a layer.
codeclient.config.angle_down.description: When facing down, within this angle, crouching will take you down a layer.
codeclient.config.tp_up.description: When jumping and facing up, you will get teleported to the layer above.
codeclient.config.tp_down.description: When crouching and facing down, you will get teleported to the layer underneath.
codeclient.config.phase_toggle.descripti: If Build Phaser should be a toggle instead of a hold.
codeclient.config.tab.interaction.descri: Customize how you actually interact with code, placing and breaking code blocks.
codeclient.config.custom_block_interacti: Hides the local block when placing, and hides a codeblock on breaking.
This can allow faster placing of blocks.
Keep codeblocks safe from accidental breaking.
They will have the survival breaking animation.
They will take 5 ticks to break (0.25 seconds)
codeclient.config.custom_tag_interaction: Toggle "faster" block tags, with interactions client handled.
codeclient.config.insert_overlay.descrip: Click on an empty slot in a code chest to insert a value.
codeclient.config.custom_code_chest_menu: Use a custom menu for chests, with value text boxes for quick editing.
codeclient.config.place_on_air.descripti: Allows you to place on air where codespaces would go.
This will interfere with other players who don't have this mod, such as helpers!
codeclient.config.scope_switcher.descrip: Right click variables to change their scope with a custom UI.
codeclient.config.report_broken_blocks.d: Get a message on breaking a block telling you what it did.
Only works for Player Event, Entity Event, Function, Call Function, Process, and Start Process.
codeclient.config.layer_interaction.desc: Controls how you interact with code layers, including ones that don't exist.
codeclient.config.pick_block_action.desc: Replaces pick block with the action
codeclient.config.recent_values.descript: Amount of recently used values to remember.
codeclient.config.state_switcher.descrip: Using F3+F4 will cycle plot /modes instead of minecraft gamemodes.
codeclient.config.speed_switcher.descrip: Using F3+F5 will cycle different flyspeeds.
codeclient.config.tab.visual.description: Purely visual elements of CodeClient, which can help in coding with information.
Show blocks like barriers and other invisible blocks whilst building or coding.
codeclient.config.show_variable_scope_be: Show the scope of a variable below its name when held, additionally stops the variable name from disappearing.
codeclient.config.show_i_on_line_scope.d: Whenever LINE is shortened, shorten it to I instead of L to avoid confusion with the LOCAL scope.
codeclient.config.show_sign_text_from_be: Show the text on a sign when looking at a codeblock from behind in a popup.
codeclient.config.param_ghosts.descripti: See and be able to hover parameter information in chest slots.
codeclient.config.value_details.descript: See text on the icons of values which give small amounts of information.
codeclient.config.cpu_display.descriptio: Whether to show the plot's CPU usage onscreen separate from the actionbar.
codeclient.config.cpu_display_corner.des: Which corner to place the on-screen CPU display.
codeclient.config.hide_scope_change_mess: Hides the message sent when changing a variable's scope.
codeclient.config.action_viewer.descript: Display a tooltip that shows the code block's description.
codeclient.config.action_viewer.enable.d: Pin code block description to the inventory while inside code chests.
codeclient.config.action_viewer.invert_s: Invert the direction the action tooltip scrolls inside code chests.
codeclient.config.action_viewer.alignmen: Change where the tooltip displays inside code chests.
codeclient.config.chest_preview.descript: An overlay showing the items from inside a chest.
codeclient.config.chest_preview.enable.d: Show a popup with with item info when looking at a chest.
codeclient.config.chest_preview.x_offset: How far horizontally the preview popup is.
codeclient.config.chest_preview.y_offset: How far vertically the preview popup is.
codeclient.config.chest_highlight.descri: A highlight for inserting items into chests
Helpful with finding where you where, or accidentally punching chests.
codeclient.config.chest_highlight.enable: Highlights the chest you inserted (via punching with an item) an item into
codeclient.config.chest_highlight.with_e: If punching a chest with an empty hand should highlight it.
codeclient.config.chest_highlight.durati: How long the highlight should show.
The last second will fade out.
codeclient.config.sign_color.description: Override the color of text on the signs in the dev space.
Using #000000 (pure black) has no effect and disable disable it.
codeclient.config.sign_color.line1.descr: The top line on a sign.
Tells you what block it is, such as PLAYER ACTION
codeclient.config.sign_color.line2.descr: The second line on a sign.
Tells you the action or data, such as SendMessage
codeclient.config.sign_color.line3.descr: The third line on a sign.
Tells you either the selection or SubAction
codeclient.config.sign_color.selection.d: Use the selection's color (or a readable similar one) for the color
codeclient.config.sign_color.line4.descr: The bottom line on a sign.
Only tells you if it is inverted: NOT
codeclient.config.chat_highlighter.descr: Modifies the chat box to display MiniMessage highlighting and marks up DF expressions.
Additionally provides a preview above the chat bar when editing styled text.
codeclient.config.chat_highlighter.with_: When enabled DF expressions will be given special formatting in your chat box.
When enabled, a preview will display above the chat bar when editing styled text.
It will additionally color the edit box to show formatting with the tags still being visible.
codeclient.config.chat_highlighter.minim: The color MiniMessage tags show up as in the chat box when modifying styled text.
codeclient.config.command.query.fail: There is no option with name %s.
codeclient.config.command.fail: You cannot set this config option.
codeclient.config.destroy_item_reset.des: Whether in dev mode, when shift left-clicking the red X in the creative inventory, it should reset your dev layout.
codeclient.parse_db: Could not parse ActionDump. Go to %s to find out how to fix this.
codeclient.phaser.plot_origin: CodeClient doesn't know the plot origin.
codeclient.phaser.dev_mode1: You cannot use phaser in build mode since %s to teleport.
Couldn't start. Check that you are on node beta.
There is a chance beta is broken and doesn't serve the Action Dump right now.
codeclient.action.get_action_dump.scanni: There will now be a file in your Minecraft directory
It will instead be printed in the console.
codeclient.action.confirmcc.use: Type /confirmcc to confirm this destructive action.
codeclient.warning.dev_mode: You must be in dev mode!
codeclient.warning.creative_mode: You must be in creative mode!
codeclient.search.hover.teleport:
Click to teleport
x: %s, y: %s, z: %s
codeclient.files.hold_template: You need to hold a template to save.
codeclient.files.empty_dir: Please use an empty folder to save into.
codeclient.files.error.cant_delete: Couldn't delete the file or folder
codeclient.files.error.not_found: Couldn't find file or folder there.
codeclient.files.git: This is a git tracked directory
codeclient.files.open_native: Click to open it in file explorer.
codeclient.files.not_in_templates: That is not in the templates directory.
codeclient.api.scope.prompt: The connected application has requested the following permissions:
codeclient.api.scope.type.read_plot: Scan plot code & get plot size
codeclient.api.scope.type.movement: Teleport to plot spawn & switch modes
codeclient.api.scope.type.clear_plot: Clear the entirety of your plot's codespace
codeclient.api.danger.default.descriptio: Assigned by default to all applications.
codeclient.api.danger.dangerous.descript: Very risky; accept with extreme caution.
codeclient.api.authorised: The connected application is now authorized with the requested permissions.
codeclient.api.remove: You can remove the app by running /auth remove.
codeclient.api.removed: Removed extra permissions from the connected app.
codeclient.api.disconnected: The connected app can no longer interact with CodeClient.
codeclient.api.scope.invalid: The connected app requested an invalid permission.
codeclient.command.dfgive.clipboard_inva: Please copy a valid give command to your clipboard
codeclient.command.name.not_found: UUID %s was not found! Please check if you misspelled it and try again
codeclient.command.name: Name of %s is %s!
codeclient.command.name.own: The UUID is yours! What a surprise!
codeclient.command.itemdata.no_nbt: No NBT found on the item.
codeclient.command.itemdata.copy: Click here to copy an %s or %s version.
